summary: Three friends who have not seen each other in seventeen years are reunited.
cast: Brasse Brännström|Magnus Härenstam|Pia Green|Ivan Oljelund|Lars Amble|Ann-Cathrine Fröjdö|Gösta Engström|Ewa Fröling|Svea Holst|Kerstin Nerbe|Arne Andersson|Gunnel Bohman|Katarina Fernell|Björn Haugan|Charlotta Larsson|Marianne Myrsten|Sören Renulf|Karin Switz
keywords: told in flashback|movie connection in title|jealousy|sailing boat|divorced couple
title: Två killar och en tjej
